statements: DELETE FROM team_budget_allocations WHERE id = 1 AND expense_amount = 5000.00
DELETE FROM team_budget_allocations WHERE revenue_amount = 3000.00 AND financial_projection = 'Positive'
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE expense_id = 3 AND expense_name = 'Office Supplies';
DELETE FROM revenue_sources WHERE revenue_amount > 1000 AND revenue_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE id = 100 AND amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM financial_projections WHERE expense_amount < 1000.00 OR revenue_amount < 2000.00;

DELETE FROM FinancialProjections WHERE team_id = 102 AND projection_date = '2022-07-20';
